audioJson.name: Mini-Cassette
audioJson.fact1: Unlike the Compact Cassette or Microcassette, this format does not use a capstan drive system; instead, the tape is propelled past the tape head by its reels
audioJson.fact2: There was a smaller version of this format called an Ultra Mini-Cassette that could record up to 10 minutes on each side
audioJson.fact3: This format was mostly used in dictation machines but could also be used as data storage
